```{r setup, message = FALSE}
library(SingleCellExperiment)
library(TabulaMurisSenisData)
```

# Introduction

This package provides access to the processed bulk and single-cell RNA-seq data 
from the _Tabula Muris Senis_ data set [REFs]. The processed data was 
downloaded from GEO [links] and packaged into `SingleCellExperiment` objects 
for easy access from R. 

# Bulk RNA-seq data

```{r}
tms_bulk <- TabulaMurisSenisBulk()
tms_bulk
```
